creditline: The RThe Ruth Ann Dayton Chinese Room Endowment Fund, The Suzanne S. Roberts Fund for Asian Art, and The Helen Jones Fund for Asian Art
description: long, black, open front coat with red wool shag collar; split sides and bottom hem faced in blue; at top of side splits are 2 long wool tassels on PL and 4 on PR connected with red and white plastic beads; sleeve cuffs piped in red; collar faced with blue and white embroidery; unlined
dimension: 52 x 53 in. (132.08 x 134.62 cm) (cuff to cuff)
title: Coat
